user_query: I'm planning to invest in cryptocurrency and I want to stay informed about the latest news and trends in the market. Can you provide me with the most recent articles on cryptocurrency from the Crypto News API? I also need the financial analysis and historic data for Tesla stock using Yahoo Finance's APIs.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest articles on cryptocurrency from the Crypto News API.
Fetch the financial analysis for Tesla stock using Yahoo Finance's APIs.
Retrieve historical data for Tesla stock using Yahoo Finance's APIs.
